ideal_referral: - Men and women struggling with hair fall, skin issues, or body fat - Brides or grooms preparing for their big day - Patients needing nose reshaping, male chest correction, or post-weight loss body contouring - Influencers, models, celebrities—anyone conscious about appearance - Burn survivors or accident victims needing reconstructive care
top_problem_solved: “Doctor, I don’t feel confident looking at the mirror.” to “I feel like myself again!” – that’s what I often hear.
